title: PRI's The World: 01/12/2015
teaser: Parisians try to regain a sense of normality today amid extremely tight security. And the situation with Boko Haram in Nigeria seems to be getting worse. There were reports late last week that a Boko Haram attack left 2,000 dead. Plus, we head to Haiti, where an earthquake five years ago today killed hundreds of thousands and left the island nation devastated.
